    168  // THE KEY CLASS ( TO READ KEY STROKES )
    169  
    170  class key
    171  {
    172  private:
    173  	int ascii_code;
    174  	int scan_code;
    175  public:
    176          key()
    177          {
    178  		ascii_code = scan_code = 99;
    179          }
    180  
    181  	void read_key_stroke( void );
    182  	void set_values( int asc , int scan );
    183  	void init( void );
    184  
    185  	int get_ascii_code( void );
    186  	int get_scan_code( void );
    187  };
    188  
    189  void key :: set_values( int asc , int scan )
    190  {
    191  	ascii_code = asc;
    192  	scan_code  = scan;
    193  }
    194  
    195  void key :: init( void )
    196  {
    197  	ascii_code = scan_code = 99;
    198  	fflush( stdin );
    199  }
    200  
    201  int key :: get_ascii_code( void )
    202  {
    203  	return ( ascii_code );
    204  }
    205  
    206  int key :: get_scan_code( void )
    207  {
    208  	return ( scan_code );
    209  }
    210  
    211  void key :: read_key_stroke( void )
    212  {
    213  	init();
    214  
    215  	while( ! kbhit() );
    216  
    217  	ascii_code = getch();
    218  
    219  	if( ascii_code == 0 )
    220  	{
    221  		scan_code = getch();
    222  	}
    223  }
    224  
    225  // THE TEXTBOX CLASS
    226  
    227  class text_box
    228  {
    229  private:
    230  	char text[ 50 ];
    231  
    232  	int current_size;
    233  	int current_position;
    234  
    235  	int from;
    236  	int length;
    237  	int row;
    238  	int skip;
    239          int page;
    240  
    241  	key my_key;
    242  public:
    243  	text_box() {}
    244  	text_box( int fr , int len , int ro , int page );
    245  	void initialize( int fr , int len , int ro , int page );
    246  
    247  	int  read( void );
    248  	void draw_textbox( int color = 11 , int back_ground_color = 1 );
    249  
    250  	void left_arrow( void );
    251  	void right_arrow( void );
    252  
    253  	void back_space( void );
    254  	void del( void );
    255  
    256  	void home( void );
    257  	void end( void );
    258  	void character( void );
    259  
    260  	int  got_focus( void );
    261  	void lost_focus( void );
    262  
    263  	char * get_text( void );
    264  	void set_text( char * string );
    265  };
    266  
    267  text_box :: text_box( int fr , int len , int ro , int page )
    268  {
    269  	initialize( fr , len , ro , page );
    270  }
    271  
    272  void text_box :: initialize( int fr , int len , int ro , int pag )
    273  {
    274  	length = len;
    275  	current_position = 0;
    276  
    277  	skip = 0;
    278  	from = fr;
    279  	row = ro;
    280          page = pag;
    281  
    282  	current_size = 0;
    283  	strcpy( text , "" );
    284  }
    285  
    286  int text_box :: got_focus( void )
    287  {
    288  	int result;
    289  
    290  	if( current_size > length )
    291  	{
    292  		current_position = length - 1;
    293  		skip = current_size - length + 1;
    294  	}
    295  	else
    296  	{
    297  		skip = 0;
    298  		current_position = current_size;
    299  	}
    300  
    301          _setcursortype( _NORMALCURSOR );
    302  	result = read();
    303  	lost_focus();
    304  
    305  	return ( result );
    306  }
    307  
    308  void text_box :: lost_focus( void )
    309  {
    310  	strupr( text );
    311  	skip = 0;
    312  	draw_textbox( 11 , 1 );
    313          _setcursortype( _NOCURSOR );
    314  }
    315  
    316  char * text_box :: get_text( void )
    317  {
    318          if( current_size <= 49 )
    319          {
    320  		text[ current_size ] = '\0';
    321          }
    322          else
    323          {
    324  		text[ 49 ] = '\0';
    325          }
    326  
    327  	return ( text );
    328  }
    329  
    330  void text_box :: set_text( char *String )
    331  {
    332          int len;
    333  	strcpy( text , String );
    334          len = strlen( String );
    335  
    336          if( len <= 50 )
    337          {
    338  		current_size = strlen( String );
    339          }
    340          else
    341          {
    342          	current_size = 50;
    343          }
    344  }
    345  
    346  int text_box :: read( void )
    347  {
    348  	int repeat_loop = 1;
    349  
    350  	while( repeat_loop )
    351  	{
    352  		draw_textbox( 15, 1 );
    353  		goto_xy( from + current_position + 1 , row , page );
    354  
    355  		my_key.read_key_stroke();
    356  
    357  		if( my_key.get_ascii_code() == 0 )
    358  		{
    359  			switch( my_key.get_scan_code() )
    360  			{
    361  				case 75: //left arrow
    362  					left_arrow();
    363  					break;
    364  
    365  				case 77: //right
    366  					right_arrow();
    367  					break;
    368  
    369  				case 71: //home key
    370  					home();
    371  					break;
    372  
    373  				case 79: //end key
    374  					end();
    375  					break;
    376  
    377  				case 83: //del key
    378  					del();
    379  					break;
    380  
    381  				case 15: //shift tab
    382  					return ( 1 );
    383  			}
    384  		}
    385  		else
    386  		{
    387  			switch( my_key.get_ascii_code() )
    388  			{
    389  				case 8://back_space
    390  					back_space();
    391  					break;
    392  
    393  				case 9://tab
    394  					return ( 2 );
    395  
    396  				case 13://enter
    397  					return ( 3 );
    398  
    399  				case 27: //esc
    400  					return ( 4 );
    401  
    402  				default:
    403  					character();
    404  					break;
    405  			}
    406  		}
    407  	}
    408  
    409  	return ( 0 );
    410  }
    411  
    412  void text_box :: right_arrow( void )
    413  {
    414  	if( ( current_position == length - 1 ) && ( skip + current_position < current_size ) )
    415  	{
    416  		skip++;
    417  	}
    418  
    419  	if( ( current_position < length - 1 ) && ( skip + current_position < current_size ) )
    420  	{
    421  		current_position++;
    422  	}
    423  }
    424  
    425  void text_box :: left_arrow( void )
    426  {
    427  	if( current_position == 0 && skip > 0 )
    428  	{
    429  		skip--;
    430  	}
    431  
    432  	if( current_position > 0 )
    433  	{
    434  		current_position--;
    435  	}
    436  }
    437  
    438  void text_box :: del( void )
    439  {
    440  	if( current_size == 0 || skip + current_position == current_size )
    441  	{
    442  		return;
    443  	}
    444  
    445  	for(int i = skip + current_position ; i < current_size ; i++ )
    446  	{
    447  		text[ i ] = text[ i + 1 ];
    448  	}
    449  
    450  	current_size--;
    451  
    452  	if( skip > 0 )
    453  	{
    454  		skip--;
    455  		current_position++;
    456  	}
    457  }
    458  
    459  void text_box :: end( void )
    460  {
    461  	if( current_size < length )
    462  	{
    463  		skip = 0;
    464  		current_position = current_size;
    465  	}
    466  	else
    467  	{
    468  		skip = current_size - length + 1;
    469  		current_position = length - 1;
    470  	}
    471  }
    472  
    473  void text_box :: back_space( void )
    474  {
    475  	int l;
    476  
    477  	if( current_position == 0 )
    478  	{
    479  		return;
    480  	}
    481  
    482  	for( l = ( skip + current_position ) ; l < current_size ; l++ )
    483  	{
    484  		text[ l - 1 ] = text[ l ];
    485  	}
    486  
    487  	current_size--;
    488  
    489  	if( skip > 0 )
    490  	{
    491  		skip--;
    492  	}
    493  	else
    494  	{
    495  		current_position--;
    496  	}
    497  }
    498  
    499  void text_box :: character( void )
    500  {
    501  	int i;
    502  
    503  	if( current_size >= 50 )
    504  	{
    505  		return;
    506  	}
    507  
    508  	current_size++;
    509  
    510  	for( i = current_size - 1 ; i >= ( skip + current_position ) + 1 ; i-- )
    511  	{
    512  		text[ i ] = text[ i - 1 ];
    513  	}
    514  
    515  	text[i] = my_key.get_ascii_code();
    516  
    517  	if( current_position == length - 1 )
    518  	{
    519  		skip++;
    520  	}
    521  	else
    522  	{
    523  		current_position++;
    524  	}
    525  }
    526  
    527  void text_box :: home( void )
    528  {
    529  	skip = 0;
    530  	current_position = 0;
    531  }
    532  
    533  void text_box :: draw_textbox( int color ,int back_ground_color )
    534  {
    535  	char far * vid_mem = ( char far * )0xB8000000L;
    536  	vid_mem += ( page * 4096 );
    537  
    538  	char far * v;
    539  	v = ( char far* ) vid_mem + 160 * ( row - 1 ) + 2 * ( from - 1 );
    540  
    541  	int i = skip;
    542  
    543  	int attrib = find_color_attribute( color , back_ground_color );
    544  
    545  	for( int j = 0 ; j < ( length + 2 ) ; j++ )
    546  	{
    547  		*v = ' ';
    548  		v++;
    549  
    550  		*v = attrib;
    551  		v++;
    552  	}
    553  
    554  	v = ( char far* ) vid_mem + 160 * ( row - 1 ) + 2 * from;
    555  	j = 0;
    556  
    557  	while( i < current_size && j < length )
    558  	{
    559  		*v = text[ i ];
    560  		v++;
    561  		*v = attrib;
    562  
    563  		i++;
    564  		v++;
    565  		j++;
    566  	}
    567  }
    568  
    569  //THE DATE CLASS
    570  
    571  class Date
    572  {
    573  private:
    574  	int day;
    575          int month;
    576          int year;
    577  
    578  	text_box textboxes[3];
    579          int tab_counter;
    580  public:
    581  	Date() {}
    582          int got_focus( int direction );
    583          void initialize( int from, int row );
    584          void initialize_textboxes( void );
    585          void set_date( int day , int month , int year );
    586          void reset( void );
    587  
    588          int get_day( void );
    589          int get_month( void );
    590          int get_year( void );
    591  
    592          int is_valid( void );
    593          void display_error_message( void );
    594  };
    595  
    596  void Date :: initialize(int from, int row)
    597  {
    598         	textboxes[0].initialize(from      , 3 , row , 1 );
    599         	textboxes[1].initialize(from + 9  , 3 , row , 1 );
    600      	textboxes[2].initialize(from + 18 , 5 , row , 1 );
    601  
    602          tab_counter = 0;
    603  
    604          display_string( "DD", 0 , 7 , 4 , from + 6 , row , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
    605          display_string( "MM", 0 , 7 , 4 , from + 15 , row , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
    606          display_string( "YY", 0 , 7 , 4 , from + 26 , row , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
    607  
    608          reset();
    609  }
    610  
    611  void Date :: set_date( int d , int m , int y )
    612  {
    613  	day = d;
    614          month = m;
    615          year = y;
    616  }
    617  
    618  int Date :: got_focus( int direction )
    619  {
    620          int result;
    621  	int repeat_loop = 1;
    622          key my_key;
    623  
    624          tab_counter = 0;
    625  
    626          if( direction == REAR )
    627          {
    628          	tab_counter = 2;
    629          }
    630  
    631          while( repeat_loop )
    632          {
    633  		result = textboxes[ tab_counter ].got_focus();
    634  
    635  		switch( result )
    636  		{
    637  			case 1: //Shift tab
    638                          	if( is_valid() )
    639                                  {
    640                                  	if( tab_counter == 0 )
    641                                          {
    642                                          	result = 1;
    643                                                  repeat_loop = 0;
    644                                          }
    645                                          else
    646                                          {
    647                                          	tab_counter--;
    648                                          }
    649                                  }
    650  				break;
    651  
    652  			case 2: //tab
    653                          	if( is_valid() )
    654                                  {
    655                                  	if( tab_counter == 2 )
    656                                          {
    657                                          	result = 2;
    658                                                  repeat_loop = 0;
    659                                          }
    660                                          else
    661                                          {
    662                                          	tab_counter++;
    663                                          }
    664                                  }
    665  				break;
    666  
    667  			case 3: //Enter
    668                          	if( is_valid() )
    669                                  {
    670  					result = 3;
    671  					repeat_loop = 0;
    672                                  }
    673  				break;
    674  
    675  			case 4: //Escape
    676  				result = 4;
    677  				repeat_loop = 0;
    678  				break;
    679  		}
    680          }
    681  
    682          return ( result );
    683  }
    684  
    685  void Date :: reset( void )
    686  {
    687          struct date temp_date;
    688          getdate( &temp_date );
    689  
    690          day = temp_date.da_day;
    691          month = temp_date.da_mon;
    692          year = temp_date.da_year;
    693  
    694          initialize_textboxes();
    695  }
    696  
    697  void Date :: initialize_textboxes( void )
    698  {
    699          char string[ 100 ];
    700  
    701  	itoa( day , string, 10 );
    702          textboxes[ 0 ].set_text( string );
    703  
    704  	itoa( month , string, 10 );
    705          textboxes[ 1 ].set_text( string );
    706  
    707  	itoa( year , string, 10 );
    708          textboxes[ 2 ].set_text( string );
    709  
    710  	for(int i=0 ; i<=2 ; i++ )
    711          {
    712          	textboxes[i].draw_textbox( 11 , 1 );
    713          }
    714  }
    715  
    716  int Date :: get_day( void )
    717  {
    718  	return ( day );
    719  }
    720  
    721  int Date :: get_month( void )
    722  {
    723  	return ( month );
    724  }
    725  
    726  int Date :: get_year( void )
    727  {
    728  	return ( year );
    729  }
    730  
    731  int Date :: is_valid( void )
    732  {
    733          int value = 0;
    734  	int value_limits[ 3 ][ 2 ] = { 1 , 31 , 1 , 12 , 1900 , 2100 };
    735          int width_limits[ 3 ] = { 2 , 2 , 4 };
    736          int days_in_month[ 12 ] = { 31 , 28 , 31 , 30 , 31 , 30 ,
    737  				    31 , 31 , 30 , 31 , 30 , 31 };
    738          char string[ 50 ];
    739  
    740          strcpy( string, textboxes[ tab_counter ].get_text() );
    741  
    742  	int len = strlen( string );
    743  
    744          if( len == 0 || len > width_limits[ tab_counter ] )
    745          {
    746                  display_error_message();
    747          	return ( 0 );
    748          }
    749  
    750  	for( int i = 0 ; i < len ; i++ )
    751         	{
    752         		if( string[ i ] < 48 || string[ i ] > 57 )
    753                  {
    754  	                display_error_message();
    755                  	return ( 0 );
    756                  }
    757                 	value = ( value * 10 ) + ( string[ i ] - 48  );
    758          }
    759  
    760          if( value < value_limits[ tab_counter ][ 0 ] || value > value_limits[ tab_counter ][1] )
    761          {
    762                  display_error_message();
    763                  return ( 0 );
    764          }
    765          else
    766          {
    767          	switch( tab_counter )
    768                  {
    769                  	case 0:
    770                          	day = value;
    771                          	break;
    772                          case 1:
    773                          	month = value;
    774                          	break;
    775                          case 2:
    776                          	year = value;
    777                          	break;
    778                  }
    779          }
    780  
    781          int leap = 0;
    782          if( year % 4 == 0 )
    783         	{
    784          	leap = 1;
    785  
    786  		if( year % 100 == 0 )
    787                  {
    788                  	if( year % 400 == 0 )
    789                          {
    790  	                	leap = 1;
    791                          }
    792                          else
    793                          {
    794                          	leap = 0;
    795                          }
    796                  }
    797          }
    798  
    799          if( leap )
    800          {
    801  		days_in_month[ 1 ] = 29;
    802          }
    803  
    804          if( day > days_in_month[ month - 1 ] )
    805         	{
    806  		tab_counter = 0;
    807                  display_error_message();
    808                  return ( 0 );
    809          }
    810  }
    811  
    812  void Date :: display_error_message( void )
    813  {
    814  	switch( tab_counter )
    815  	{
    816                 	case 0:
    817  			msgbox( " ERROR " , " PLEASE ENTER A VALID DAY     " , 2 );
    818                         	break;
    819  		case 1:
    820  			msgbox( " ERROR " , " PLEASE ENTER A VALID MONTH   " , 2 );
    821                         	break;
    822  		case 2:
    823  			msgbox( " ERROR " , " PLEASE ENTER A VALID YEAR    " , 2 );
    824                         	break;
    825  	}
    826  }

    937                  out_file.write( temp_string , strlen( temp_string ) );

    939

    941                  strcpy( temp_string , "Rs. " );
    942                  strcat( temp_string , float_to_string( balance_amount ) );
    943                  strcat( temp_string , "\n" );
    944                  out_file.write( temp_string , strlen( temp_string ) );

    947  	}
    948  
    949          in_file.close();
    950          out_file.close();
    951  }

   1061  
   1062  void draw_border( int x1 , int y1 , int x2 , int y2 , int type , int fore_ground_color , int back_ground_color , int shadow , int page )
   1063  {
   1064  	char far * vid_mem = ( char far * ) 0XB8000000 ;
   1065  	char far * v;
   1066  
   1067  	vid_mem += ( page * 4096 ) ;
   1068  	char arr[ 6 ] , attrib;
   1069  
   1070  	attrib = find_color_attribute( fore_ground_color , back_ground_color );
   1071  
   1072  	if( type == DOUBLE )
   1073  	{
   1074  		strcpy( arr , "" );
   1075  	}
   1076  	else
   1077  	{
   1078  		strcpy( arr , "" );
   1079  	}
   1080  
   1081  	for( int i = x1 ; i < x2 ; i++ )
   1082  	{
   1083  		v = vid_mem + 160 * ( y1 - 1 ) + i * 2 ;
   1084  		*v = arr[ 0 ];
   1085  		v++;
   1086  		*v = attrib;
   1087  
   1088  		v = vid_mem + 160 * ( y2 - 1 ) + i * 2 ;
   1089  		*v = arr[ 0 ];
   1090  		v++;
   1091  		*v = attrib;
   1092  	}
   1093  
   1094  	for( i = y1 ; i < y2 - 1 ; i++ )
   1095  	{
   1096  		v = vid_mem + 160 * i + ( x1 - 1 ) * 2 ;
   1097  		*v = arr[ 1 ];
   1098  		v++;
   1099  		*v = attrib;
   1100  
   1101  		v = vid_mem + 160 * i + ( x2 - 1 ) * 2 ;
   1102  		*v = arr[ 1 ];
   1103  		v++;
   1104  		*v = attrib;
   1105  	}
   1106  
   1107  	v = vid_mem + 160 * ( y1 - 1 ) + ( 2 * ( x1 - 1 ) ) ;		*v = arr[ 2 ]; v++; *v = attrib;
   1108  	v = vid_mem + 160 * ( y2 - 1 ) + ( 2 * ( x1 - 1 ) ) ;		*v = arr[ 3 ]; v++; *v = attrib;
   1109  	v = vid_mem + 160 * ( y1 - 1 ) + ( 2 * ( x2 - 1 ) ) ;		*v = arr[ 4 ]; v++; *v = attrib;
   1110  	v = vid_mem + 160 * ( y2 - 1 ) + ( 2 * ( x2 - 1 ) ) ;		*v = arr[ 5 ]; v++; *v = attrib;
   1111  
   1112  	if( shadow == SHADOW )
   1113  	{
   1114  		int i;
   1115  
   1116  		for( i = x1 + 1 ; i < x2 ; i++ )
   1117  		{
   1118  			v = vid_mem + 160 * y2 + 2 * i ;
   1119  			v++;
   1120  			*v = 8;
   1121  		}
   1122  
   1123  		for( i = y1 ; i <= y2 ; i++ )
   1124  		{
   1125  			v = vid_mem + 160 * i + 2 * x2 ;
   1126  			v++;
   1127  			*v = 8;
   1128  
   1129  			v = vid_mem + 160 * i + 2 * x2 + 2 ;
   1130  			v++;
   1131  			*v = 8;
   1132  		}
   1133  	}
   1134  }
   1135  
   1136  void draw_line( int type , int row , int from , int to , int fore_ground_color , int back_ground_color , int page )
   1137  {
   1138  	char far * vid_mem = ( char far * ) 0XB8000000 ;
   1139  	char far * v;
   1140  
   1141  	vid_mem += page * 4096 ;
   1142  
   1143  	int attrib = find_color_attribute( fore_ground_color , back_ground_color );
   1144  	char arr[ 3 ];
   1145  
   1146  	if( type == SINGLE )
   1147  	{
   1148  		strcpy( arr , "" );
   1149  	}
   1150  	else
   1151  	{
   1152  		strcpy( arr , "" );
   1153  	}
   1154  
   1155  	v = vid_mem + 160 * ( row - 1 ) + 2 * from;
   1156  	*v = arr[ 0 ];
   1157  	v++;
   1158  	*v = attrib;
   1159  
   1160  	v = vid_mem + 160 * ( row - 1 ) + 2 * to;
   1161  	*v = arr[ 2 ];
   1162  	v++;
   1163  	*v = attrib;
   1164  
   1165  	for( int i = from + 1 ; i < to ; i++ )
   1166  	{
   1167  		v = vid_mem + 160 * ( row - 1 ) + 2 * i;
   1168  		*v = arr[ 1 ];
   1169  
   1170  		v++;
   1171  		*v = attrib;
   1172  	}
   1173  }
   1174  
   1175  void fill_screen( int x1 , int y1 , int x2 , int y2 , int color , int page )
   1176  {
   1177  	char far * vid_mem = ( char far * ) 0XB8000000 ;
   1178  	char far * v;
   1179  
   1180  	vid_mem += page * 4096 ;
   1181  
   1182  	char attrib = find_color_attribute ( color , color );
   1183  
   1184  	for( int i = x1 - 1 ; i <= x2 ; i++ )
   1185  	{
   1186  		for( int j = y1 - 1 ; j < y2; j++ )
   1187  		{
   1188  			v = vid_mem + 160 * j + 2 * i ;
   1189  			*v = ' ' ;
   1190  
   1191  			v++;
   1192  			*v = attrib;
   1193  		}
   1194  	}
   1195  }
   1196  
   1197  void copy_video_page( int from , int to )
   1198  {
   1199  	char far * vid_mem = ( char far * ) 0xB8000000L;
   1200  
   1201  	for( int i = 0 ; i < 4096 ; i++ )
   1202  	{
   1203  		* ( vid_mem + ( to * 4096 ) + i ) = * ( vid_mem + ( from * 4096 ) + i );
   1204  	}
   1205  }
   1206  
   1207  void change_active_video_page( int to )
   1208  {
   1209  	union REGS i , o;
   1210  
   1211  	i.h.ah = 0x05;
   1212  	i.h.al = to;
   1213  
   1214  	int86( 0x10 , &i , &o );
   1215  }
   1216  
   1217  void goto_xy( int x , int y , int page )
   1218  {
   1219  	union REGS i , o;
   1220  
   1221  	i.h.ah = 0x02 ;
   1222  	i.h.bh = page;
   1223  
   1224  	i.h.dh = ( y - 1 );
   1225  	i.h.dl = ( x - 1 );
   1226  
   1227  	int86( 0x10 , &i , &o );
   1228  }
   1229  
   1230  int find_color_attribute( int fore_ground_color , int back_ground_color )
   1231  {
   1232  	return ( back_ground_color * 16 + fore_ground_color );
   1233  }
   1234  
   1235  void display_string( char * string , int fore_ground_color , int back_ground_color , int hot_key_color , int column, int row , int shadow , int page )
   1236  {
   1237  	int i = 0 , j = 0;
   1238  
   1239  	char far * vid_mem = ( char far * ) 0XB8000000;
   1240  	char far * v;
   1241  	char far * start;
   1242  
   1243  	vid_mem += ( page * 4096 ) ;
   1244  
   1245  	char attrib1 = find_color_attribute( hot_key_color , back_ground_color );
   1246  	char attrib2 = find_color_attribute( fore_ground_color , back_ground_color );
   1247  
   1248  	start = ( char far * ) vid_mem + 160 * ( row - 1 ) + 2 * ( column- 1 );
   1249  
   1250  	while( string[ i ] != '\0' )
   1251  	{
   1252  		v = start + ( j * 2 ) ;
   1253  
   1254  		if( string[ i ] == '&' )
   1255  		{
   1256  			*v = string[ i + 1 ];
   1257  			v++;
   1258  
   1259  			*v = attrib1;
   1260  			i++;
   1261  		}
   1262  		else
   1263  		{
   1264  			*v = string[ i ];
   1265  			v++;
   1266  			*v = attrib2;
   1267  		}
   1268  
   1269  		i++;
   1270  		j++;
   1271  	}
   1272  
   1273  	if( shadow == SHADOW )
   1274  	{
   1275  		int length = strlen( string );
   1276  
   1277  		for( i = column ; i < ( column + length - 1 ) ; i++ )
   1278  		{
   1279  			v= vid_mem + 160 * row + 2 * i ;
   1280  			*v = '' ;
   1281  
   1282  			v++;
   1283  			*v = 112;
   1284  		}
   1285  
   1286  		v = vid_mem + 160 * ( row - 1 ) + 2 * ( i - 1 ) ;
   1287  		*v = '' ;
   1288  
   1289  		v++;
   1290  		*v = 112;
   1291  	}
   1292  }
   1293  
   1294  void modified_display_string( char * string )
   1295  {
   1296          char temp_string[ 50 ];
   1297  	int length = strlen( string );
   1298          int count = 0;
   1299          int row = 7;
   1300  
   1301  	fill_screen( 26 , 7 , 76 , 20 , 1 , 0 );
   1302  
   1303          for( int i = 0 ; i < length; i++ )
   1304          {
   1305          	if( string[ i ] == '*' )
   1306                  {
   1307                          temp_string[ count ] = '\0';
   1308  	        	display_string( temp_string , 15 , 1 , 4 , 26 , row , 0 , 0 );
   1309                  	count = 0;
   1310                          row ++;
   1311                          continue;
   1312                  }
   1313                  temp_string[ count ] = string[ i ];
   1314                  count++;
   1315          }
   1316  }
   1317  
   1318  void dos_shell( void )
   1319  {
   1320  	char *temp;
   1321  
   1322  	temp = searchpath("COMMAND.COM");
   1323  
   1324  	if( temp != NULL )
   1325  	{
   1326  		copy_video_page( 0 , 1 );
   1327  		clrscr();
   1328  		_setcursortype(_NORMALCURSOR);
   1329  		printf( "TYPE EXIT TO RETURN TO HOSTEL MANAGEMENT. . .\n" );
   1330  		system( temp );
   1331  		textmode( C80 );
   1332  		_setcursortype(_NOCURSOR);
   1333  		copy_video_page( 1 , 0 );
   1334  	}
   1335  	else
   1336  	{
   1337  		msgbox( " ERROR " , "    THE FILE COMMAND.COM NOT FOUND    " , 1 );
   1338  	}
   1339  }
   1340  
   1341  int is_filename_valid( char * filename )
   1342  {
   1343  	int length = strlen( filename );
   1344  	int i;
   1345  	int j;
   1346  	int dot_occured = 0;
   1347  
   1348  	char violations[ 20 ] = "\"\t <>+:;[]|,?*";
   1349  
   1350          if( length == 0 )
   1351          {
   1352          	return ( 0 );
   1353          }
   1354  
   1355  	for( i = 0 ; i < length ; i++ )
   1356  	{
   1357  		if( filename[ i ] == '.' )
   1358  		{
   1359  			if( dot_occured == 1 )
   1360  			{
   1361                          	return ( 0 );
   1362  			}
   1363  			else
   1364  			{
   1365  				dot_occured = 1;
   1366  			}
   1367  		}
   1368  
   1369  		for( j = 0 ; j < 14 ; j++ )
   1370  		{
   1371  			if( filename[ i ] == violations[ j ] )
   1372  			{
   1373                          	return ( 0 );
   1374  			}
   1375  		}
   1376  	}
   1377  	return ( 1 );
   1378  }
   1379  
   1380  int is_chronological( date first , date second )
   1381  {
   1382  	if( first.da_year < second.da_year )
   1383          {
   1384          	return ( 0 );
   1385          }
   1386  
   1387  	if( ( first.da_mon < second.da_mon ) && ( first.da_year == second.da_year ) )
   1388          {
   1389          	return ( 0 );
   1390          }
   1391  
   1392  	if( ( first.da_day < second.da_day ) && ( first.da_mon == second.da_mon ) )
   1393          {
   1394          	return ( 0 );
   1395          }
   1396  
   1397          return ( 1 );
   1398  }
   1399  
   1400  char * get_date_string( int day , int month , int year )
   1401  {
   1402          char date_string[ 50 ];
   1403          char temp_string[ 50 ];
   1404  
   1405          strcpy( date_string , "" );
   1406  
   1407          if( day < 10 )
   1408          {
   1409          	strcpy( date_string , "0" );
   1410          }
   1411  
   1412  	itoa( day , temp_string , 10 );
   1413  	strcat( date_string , temp_string );
   1414  	strcat( date_string , "/" );
   1415  
   1416          if( month < 10 )
   1417          {
   1418          	strcat( date_string , "0" );
   1419          }
   1420  
   1421  	itoa( month , temp_string , 10 );
   1422  	strcat( date_string , temp_string );
   1423  	strcat( date_string , "/" );
   1424  	itoa( year , temp_string , 10 );
   1425  	strcat( date_string , temp_string );
   1426  
   1427          return ( date_string );
   1428  }
   1429  
   1430  int does_room_number_exist( char * room_no )
   1431  {
   1432          int result = 0;
   1433  	ifstream file;
   1434  
   1435          file.open( "ROOMS.DAT" , ios::in | ios::binary );
   1436          file.read( (char *) &temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   1437  
   1438          while( file )
   1439          {
   1440                  if( strcmp( room_no , temp_room.room_no ) == 0 )
   1441                  {
   1442                  	result = 1;
   1443                          break;
   1444                  }
   1445  	        file.read( (char *) &temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   1446          }
   1447  
   1448          file.close();
   1449          return ( result );
   1450  }
   1451  
   1452  int count_members_in_the_room( char * room_no )
   1453  {
   1454          int count = 0;
   1455  	ifstream file;
   1456  
   1457          file.open( "MEMBERS.DAT" , ios::in | ios::binary );
   1458          file.read( (char *) &temp_member , sizeof( temp_member ) );
   1459  
   1460          while( file )
   1461          {
   1462                  if( strcmp( room_no , temp_member.room_no ) == 0 )
   1463                  {
   1464                  	count++;
   1465                  }
   1466  	        file.read( (char *) &temp_member , sizeof( temp_member ) );
   1467          }
   1468  
   1469          file.close();
   1470          return ( count );
   1471  }

   1475  void msgbox( char * title , char * message , int page )
   1476  {
   1477  	char ch = 1;
   1478  	int len , position;
   1479  
   1480  	copy_video_page( page - 1 , page );
   1481  
   1482  	len = strlen( message );
   1483  	position = ( 80 - len ) / 2;
   1484  
   1485  	draw_border( position - 3 , 10 , position + len + 3 , 17 , DOUBLE , 15 , 7 , SHADOW , page );
   1486  	fill_screen( position - 2 , 11 , position + len + 1 , 16 , 7 , page );
   1487  	fill_screen( position - 1 , 11 , position + len , 13 , 3 , page );
   1488  
   1489  	display_string( message , 0 , 3 , 4 , position , 12 , NO_SHADOW , page );
   1490  	display_string( "    &OK    " , 15 , 2 , 14 , 35 , 15 , SHADOW , page );
   1491  
   1492  	len = strlen( title );
   1493  	position = ( 80 - len ) / 2;
   1494  
   1495  	display_string( title , 15 , 7 , 4 , position , 10 , NO_SHADOW , page );
   1496  
   1497  	change_active_video_page( page );
   1498  
   1499  	while( ( ch != 13 ) && ( ch != 27 ) && ( ch != 32 ) && ( ch!='o' ) && ( ch!='O' ) )
   1500  	{
   1501  		ch = getch();
   1502  	}
   1503  	change_active_video_page( page-1 );
   1504  }
   1505  
   1506  int yes_no( char * message )
   1507  {
   1508  	static char buttons[ 2 ][ 15 ] = {
   1509  		"   &YES   " ,
   1510  		"    &NO    "
   1511  	};
   1512  
   1513  	static int positions[ 2 ] = { 29 , 42 };
   1514  
   1515  	int tab_counter = 0 , repeat_loop = 1 , result ;
   1516  
   1517  	key my_key;
   1518  
   1519  	copy_video_page( 0 , 1 );
   1520  
   1521  	draw_border( 20 , 10 , 60 , 17 , DOUBLE , 15 , 7 , SHADOW , 1 );
   1522  	fill_screen( 21 , 11 , 58 , 16 , 7 , 1 );
   1523  	fill_screen( 22 , 11 , 57 , 13 , 3 , 1 );
   1524  
   1525  	display_string( " WARNING " , 15 , 7 , 4 , 35 , 10 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   1526  	display_string( message , 0 , 3 , 4 , 24 , 12 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   1527  
   1528  	change_active_video_page( 1 );
   1529  
   1530  	while( repeat_loop )
   1531  	{
   1532  		for ( int i = 0 ; i <= 1 ; i++ )
   1533  		{
   1534  			if( i == tab_counter )
   1535  			{
   1536  				display_string( buttons[ i ] , 15 , 1 , 14 ,  positions[ i ] , 15 , SHADOW , 1 );
   1537  			}
   1538  			else
   1539  			{
   1540  				display_string( buttons[ i ] , 15 , 2 , 14 , positions[ i ] , 15 , SHADOW , 1 );
   1541  			}
   1542  		}
   1543  
   1544  		my_key.read_key_stroke();
   1545  
   1546  		if( my_key.get_ascii_code() == 0 )
   1547  		{
   1548  			switch( my_key.get_scan_code() )
   1549  			{
   1550  				case 15: // Shift + tab
   1551  					if( tab_counter == 0 )
   1552  					{
   1553  						tab_counter = 1;
   1554  					}
   1555  					else
   1556  					{
   1557  						tab_counter = 0;
   1558  					}
   1559  
   1560  					break;
   1561  			}
   1562  		}
   1563  		else
   1564  		{
   1565  			switch( my_key.get_ascii_code() )
   1566  			{
   1567  				case 27: // Esc
   1568  					result = 1;
   1569  					repeat_loop = 0;
   1570  
   1571  					break;
   1572  
   1573  				case 13: // Enter
   1574  					result = tab_counter ;
   1575  					repeat_loop = 0;
   1576  
   1577  					break;
   1578  
   1579  				case 9:  // tab key
   1580  					if( tab_counter == 1 )
   1581  					{
   1582  						tab_counter = 0;
   1583  					}
   1584  					else
   1585  					{
   1586  						tab_counter = 1;
   1587  					}
   1588  					break;
   1589  			}
   1590  		}
   1591  	}
   1592  
   1593  	change_active_video_page( 0 );
   1594  	return ( result );
   1595  }

   1929  					break;
   1930  			}

   1940  int read_member_record_dialog_box( int * record_no )
   1941  {
   1942  	int result = 0;
   1943          int skip = 0;
   1944          int tab_counter = 0;
   1945          int repeat_loop = 1;
   1946  
   1947          key my_key;
   1948  
   1949          text_box rec_no( 39 , 15 , 11 , 1 );
   1950          text_box name( 24 , 30 , 14 , 1 );
   1951

   2027  		                        {

   2040                                  	tab_counter = 0;
   2041                                          break;
   2042                                  case 2:
   2043                                  	tab_counter = 1;
   2044                                          break;
   2045                          }
   2046  		}
   2047  		else
   2048  		{
   2049  			switch( my_key.get_ascii_code() )
   2050  			{
   2051  				case 9: //tab
   2052                                  	switch( tab_counter )
   2053                                          {
   2054                                          	case 0:
   2055  							result = string_to_int( rec_no.get_text() , record_no );
   2056  
   2057  	        	                        	if( ! result )

   2079                                                  	break;
   2080                                                  case 2:
   2081                                                  	tab_counter = 0;
   2082                                                  	break;
   2083                                          }
   2084  					break;

   2120  int add_expenses_record_dialog_box( int load_values )

   2174                          }

   2189                  	        	break;

   2200                          }

   2208  				case 2: //tab
   2209  					my_key.set_values( 9 , 15 );
   2210  					break;
   2211  
   2212  				case 3: //Enter
   2213  					my_key.set_values( 13 , 1 );
   2214  					break;
   2215  
   2216  				case 4: //Escape
   2217                                          my_key.set_values( 27 , 1 );
   2218  					break;
   2219  			}
   2220                          skip = 1;
   2221                  }
   2222  
   2223  		if( skip == 0 )
   2224  		{
   2225  			my_key.read_key_stroke();
   2226  		}
   2227  
   2228  		if( my_key.get_ascii_code() == 0 )
   2229  		{
   2230  			switch( my_key.get_scan_code() )
   2231                          {
   2232                          	case 15: //shift tab
   2233  	        	        	prev_tab = tab_counter;
   2234  
   2235  					if( tab_counter == 0 )
   2236  					{
   2237  						tab_counter = 4;
   2238  					}
   2239  					else
   2240  					{
   2241  						tab_counter--;
   2242  					}
   2243                          }
   2244  		}
   2245  		else
   2246  		{
   2247  			switch( my_key.get_ascii_code() )
   2248  			{
   2249  				case 9: //tab
   2250                                  	prev_tab = tab_counter;
   2251  
   2252  					if( tab_counter == 4 )
   2253  					{
   2254  						tab_counter = 0;
   2255  					}
   2256  					else
   2257  					{
   2258  						tab_counter++;
   2259  					}
   2260  
   2261  					break;
   2262  
   2263  				case 13:  //enter
   2264                                  	if( tab_counter == 4 )
   2265                                          {
   2266                                          	repeat_loop = 0;
   2267                                                  result = 0;
   2268                                          	break;
   2269                                          }
   2270  
   2271  					if( strcmp( item_name.get_text() , "" ) == 0 )
   2272  					{
   2273  						tab_counter = 0;
   2274  						msgbox( " ERROR " , "  THE ITEM NAME FIELD MUST BE FILLED    " , 2 );
   2275                                                  break;
   2276  					}
   2277  
   2278                                  	float Price;
   2279                                  	if( ! string_to_float( price.get_text() , &Price ) )
   2280                                          {
   2281                                                  tab_counter = 1;
   2282  						msgbox( " ERROR " , "  PLEASE ENTER A VALID VALUE FOR PRICE PER ITEM   " , 2 );
   2283                                                  break;
   2284                                          }
   2285  
   2286                                          if( Price > find_balance_amount() )
   2287                                          {
   2288                                                  tab_counter = 1;
   2289  						msgbox( " ERROR " , "  THE PRICE EXCEEDS THE BALANCE AMOUNT            " , 2 );
   2290                                                  break;
   2291                                          }
   2292  
   2293                                          strncpy( temp_expenses.item , item_name.get_text() , 20 );
   2294                                          temp_expenses.price = Price;
   2295                                          temp_expenses.day = my_date.get_day();
   2296                                          temp_expenses.month = my_date.get_month();
   2297                                          temp_expenses.year = my_date.get_year();
   2298  
   2299                                          result = 1;
   2300                                          repeat_loop = 0;
   2301                                          break;
   2302  				case 27:   //escape
   2303  					repeat_loop = 0;
   2304                                          result = 0;
   2305  					break;
   2306  			}
   2307  		}
   2308  		skip = 0;
   2309          }
   2310   	change_active_video_page( 0 );
   2311          return ( result );
   2312  }

   2676                                          	break;

   2692                                                  break;

   2708  			}

   3542  //REQUIRED DATATYPE CONVERSION FUNCTIONS
   3543  
   3544  char * float_to_string( float value )
   3545  {
   3546  	unsigned long decimal;
   3547          int mantessa;
   3548          char temp[50];
   3549          char temp2[50];
   3550  
   3551          decimal = value;
   3552          mantessa =  int( float( value - decimal ) * 100 );
   3553          ultoa( decimal , temp , 10 );
   3554          strcat( temp , "." );
   3555          itoa( mantessa , temp2 , 10 );
   3556  
   3557          if( strlen( temp2 ) < 2 )
   3558          {
   3559          	strcat( temp2 , "0" );
   3560          }
   3561  
   3562          strcat( temp , temp2 );
   3563  
   3564          return ( temp );
   3565  }
   3566  
   3567  int string_to_float( char * string , float * value )
   3568  {
   3569          int length = strlen( string );
   3570          unsigned long decimal = 0;
   3571          int mantessa = 0;
   3572  
   3573          if( length == 0 || length > 8 )
   3574          {
   3575          	return ( 0 );
   3576          }
   3577  
   3578          for( int i = 0 ; i < length && string[ i ] != '.' ; i++ )
   3579          {
   3580          	if( string[ i ] < 48 || string[ i ] > 57 || i > 4 )
   3581                  {
   3582                  	return ( 0 );
   3583                  }
   3584                  else
   3585                  {
   3586                  	if( i > 5 )
   3587                          {
   3588                          	return ( 0 );
   3589                          }
   3590                  }
   3591  
   3592                  decimal = decimal * 10 + ( string[ i ] - 48 );
   3593          }
   3594  
   3595          i++;
   3596  
   3597          for( ; i < length ; i++ )
   3598          {
   3599          	if( string[ i ] < 48 || string[ i ] > 57 || mantessa > 9 )
   3600                  {
   3601                  	return ( 0 );
   3602                  }
   3603                  mantessa = mantessa * 10 + ( string[ i ] - 48 );
   3604          }
   3605  
   3606  	( * value ) = float( decimal + (float) mantessa / 100 );
   3607          return ( 1 );
   3608  }
   3609  
   3610  int string_to_int( char * string , int * value )
   3611  {
   3612          int len = strlen( string );
   3613          int temp = 0;
   3614  
   3615          if( len == 0 || len > 4 )
   3616          {
   3617          	return ( 0 );
   3618          }
   3619  
   3620          for( int i = 0 ; i < len ; i++ )
   3621          {
   3622          	if( string[ i ] < 48 || string[ i ] > 57 )
   3623                  {
   3624                  	return ( 0 );
   3625                  }
   3626                 	temp = temp * 10 + ( string[ i ] - 48 );
   3627          }
   3628  
   3629  	( *value ) = temp;
   3630          return ( 1 );
   3631  }

   3635  void main_menu( void )

   3650          int selected = 0;

   3689                  }
   3690  
   3691  	        for( i = 0 ; i <= 7 ; i++ )

   3694                  	{
   3695  		        	display_string( menu_items[i], 0 , 2 , 4 , 4 , 5+i , 0 , 0 );
   3696  	                }

   3700  	                }

   3702  
   3703                  if( skip == 0 )

   3705  	                ch=getch();
   3706                  }
   3707                  skip = 0;
   3708  
   3709                  switch( ch )
   3710                  {
   3711                          case 72://up
   3712                          case 75://left

   3715                                  {
   3716  	                        	selected--;
   3717                                  }

   3729  
   3730                                  }
   3731                                  else
   3732                                  {
   3733                                  	selected = 0;
   3734                                  }
   3735                                  break;
   3736                          case 13:
   3737                          	switch( selected )
   3738                                  {
   3739                                          case 0:
   3740                                          	switch( sub_menu( 6 ) )

   3742                                                  	case 0:

   3751                                                                          }
   3752                                                                          else
   3753                                                                          {
   3754                                                                          	temp_room = temp;
   3755  	                                                                	write_room_record_to_file();

   4013  
   4014  int reports_menu( void )
   4015  {
   4016          int selected = 0;
   4017          int exit = 0;
   4018          int skip = 0;
   4019          char ch;
   4020          int result = -1;
   4021          static char items[ 4 ][ 20 ] = {
   4022          				 " &1 ROOMS        ",
   4023  					 " &2 MEMBERS      ",
   4024          			   	 " &3 BILLS        ",
   4025          			  	 " &4 EXPENSES     "
   4026          			       };
   4027  
   4028  	copy_video_page( 0 , 1 );
   4029          change_active_video_page( 1 );
   4030  
   4031          draw_border( 4 , 10 , 21  , 15 , SINGLE , 0 , 7 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4032  
   4033          while( !exit )
   4034          {
   4035  	        for( int i = 0; i <= 3 ; i++ )
   4036  	        {
   4037          		if( i == selected )
   4038  	                {
   4039  			        display_string( items[ i ] , 0 , 2 , 4 , 5 , 11 + i , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4040  	                }
   4041          	        else
   4042                  	{
   4043  				display_string( items[ i ] , 0 , 7 , 4 , 5 , 11 + i , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4044          	        }
   4045  	        }
   4046  
   4047                  if( skip == 0 )
   4048                  {
   4049  	                ch=getch();
   4050                  }
   4051                  skip = 0;
   4052  
   4053                  switch( ch )
   4054                  {
   4055                          case 72://up
   4056                          case 75://left
   4057                          	if( selected > 0 )
   4058                                  {
   4059  	                        	selected--;
   4060                                  }
   4061                                  else
   4062                                  {
   4063                                  	selected = 3;
   4064                                  }
   4065                                  break;
   4066                          case 80: //down
   4067                          case 77: //right
   4068                          	if( selected < 3 )
   4069                                  {
   4070  	                        	selected++;
   4071                                  }
   4072                                  else
   4073                                  {
   4074                                  	selected = 0;
   4075                                  }
   4076                                  break;
   4077                          case 27:
   4078                          	exit = 1;
   4079                                  break;
   4080                          case 13:
   4081                          	exit = 1;
   4082                                  result = selected;
   4083                                  break;
   4084                          default:
   4085                          	if( ch > 48 && ch < 53 )
   4086                                  {
   4087                                  	selected = ch - 49;
   4088                                          ch = 13;
   4089                                          skip = 1;
   4090                                  }
   4091                          	break;
   4092                  }
   4093          }
   4094          change_active_video_page( 0 );
   4095          return ( result );
   4096  }
   4097  
   4098  int sub_menu( int row )
   4099  {
   4100          int selected = 0;
   4101          int exit = 0;
   4102          int skip = 0;
   4103          int result = -1;
   4104          char ch;
   4105          static char items[ 3 ][ 20 ] = { " &1 ADD          ",
   4106          			  	 " &2 REMOVE       ",
   4107                                           " &3 MODIFY       "
   4108          			       };
   4109  
   4110  	copy_video_page( 0 , 1 );
   4111          change_active_video_page( 1 );
   4112  
   4113          draw_border( 4 , row , 21  , row + 4 , SINGLE , 0 , 7 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4114  
   4115          while( !exit )
   4116          {
   4117  	        for( int i = 0; i < 3 ; i++ )
   4118  	        {
   4119          		if( i == selected )
   4120  	                {
   4121  			        display_string( items[ i ] , 0 , 2 , 4 , 5 , row + 1 + i , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4122  	                }
   4123          	        else
   4124                  	{
   4125  				display_string( items[ i ] , 0 , 7 , 4 , 5 , row + 1 + i , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4126          	        }
   4127  	        }
   4128  
   4129                  if( skip == 0 )
   4130                  {
   4131  	                ch=getch();
   4132                  }
   4133                  skip = 0;
   4134  
   4135                  switch( ch )
   4136                  {
   4137                          case 72://up
   4138                          case 75://left
   4139                          	if( selected > 0 )
   4140                                  {
   4141                                  	selected--;
   4142                                  }
   4143                                  else
   4144                                  {
   4145                                  	selected = 2;
   4146                                  }
   4147                                  break;
   4148                          case 80: //down
   4149                          case 77: //right
   4150                          	if( selected < 2 )
   4151                                  {
   4152                                  	selected++;
   4153                                  }
   4154                                  else
   4155                                  {
   4156                                  	selected = 0;
   4157                                  }
   4158                                  break;
   4159                          case 27:
   4160                          	exit = 1;
   4161                                  break;
   4162                          case 13:
   4163                          	exit = 1;
   4164                          	switch( selected )
   4165                                  {
   4166                                  	case 0:
   4167                                                  result = 0;
   4168  						break;
   4169                                          case 1:
   4170                                                  result = 1;
   4171                                          	break;
   4172                                          case 2:
   4173                                          	result = 2;
   4174                                                  break;
   4175                                  }
   4176                                  break;
   4177                          default:
   4178                          	if( ch > 48 && ch < 52 )
   4179                                  {
   4180                                  	selected = ch - 49;
   4181                                          ch = 13;
   4182                                          skip = 1;
   4183                                  }
   4184                          	break;
   4185                  }
   4186          }
   4187          change_active_video_page( 0 );
   4188          return ( result );
   4189  }
   4190  
   4191  //REQUIRED REPORTS
   4192  
   4193  void expenses_report( void )
   4194  {
   4195          int counter = 0;
   4196          int record_no = 0;
   4197          int tab_counter = 0;
   4198          int repeat_loop = 1;
   4199          int skip = 0;
   4200          int count = 0;
   4201          int temp;
   4202          int refresh = TRUE;
   4203  
   4204          char temp_string[20];
   4205  
   4206  	copy_video_page( 0 , 1 );
   4207          change_active_video_page( 1 );
   4208  
   4209          count = count_expenses_records();
   4210  
   4211          if( count == 0 )
   4212          {
   4213          	msgbox( " ERROR " , "  THERE ARE NO RECORDS IN THE EXPENSES LIST    " , 1 );
   4214                  return;
   4215          }
   4216  
   4217          float total_amount = find_total_amount();
   4218          float balance_amount = total_amount;
   4219  
   4220          ifstream file;
   4221          file.open( expenses_file , ios::in | ios::binary );
   4222  
   4223          key my_key;
   4224  
   4225          draw_border( 3 , 2 , 78  , 24 , DOUBLE , 15 , 7 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4226  	fill_screen( 4 , 3 , 76 , 23 , 7 , 1 );
   4227          display_string( " EXPENSES REPORT ", 15 , 7 , 15 , 31 , 2 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4228          display_string( "NO.  ITEM NAME              PRICE          DATE         BALANCE", 15 , 7 , 15 , 7 , 4 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4229  	display_string( "" , 15 , 7 , 4 , 5 , 5 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4230  
   4231          while( repeat_loop )
   4232          {
   4233                  balance_amount = total_amount;
   4234                  counter = 0;
   4235  
   4236  	        display_string( "  &PREVIOUS  "   , 0 , 2 , 14 , 12 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4237  	        display_string( "   &NEXT   "     , 0 , 2 , 14 , 27 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4238          	display_string( " &WRITE TO FILE ", 0 , 2 , 14 , 40 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4239  	        display_string( "    &OK    "     , 0 , 2 , 14 , 58 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4240  
   4241  		switch( tab_counter )
   4242  		{
   4243                  	case 0:
   4244  			        display_string( "  &PREVIOUS  "   , 15 , 2 , 14 , 12 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4245                          	break;
   4246                          case 1:
   4247  			        display_string( "   &NEXT   "     , 15 , 2 , 14 , 27 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4248                          	break;
   4249                          case 2:
   4250  		        	display_string( " &WRITE TO FILE ", 15 , 2 , 14 , 40 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4251                          	break;
   4252                          case 3:
   4253  			        display_string( "    &OK    "     , 15 , 2 , 14 , 58 , 22 , SHADOW , 1 );
   4254                          	break;
   4255  		}
   4256  
   4257                  temp = skip;
   4258  
   4259                  if( refresh == TRUE )
   4260                  {
   4261  			fill_screen( 4 , 6 , 76 , 21 , 7 , 1 );
   4262  
   4263  			file.read( (char *) & temp_expenses , sizeof( temp_expenses ) );
   4264  
   4265  	                while( file && temp-- )
   4266          	        {
   4267                                  record_no++;
   4268  		                balance_amount = balance_amount - temp_expenses.price;
   4269  				file.read( (char *) & temp_expenses , sizeof( temp_expenses ) );
   4270  	                }
   4271  
   4272  		        while( file && counter < 15 )
   4273          		{
   4274                                  record_no++;
   4275                                  itoa( record_no , temp_string , 10 );
   4276                                  strcat( temp_string , "." );
   4277  			        display_string(  temp_string , 15 , 7 , 4 , 7 , counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4278  
   4279  			        display_string( temp_expenses.item , 0 , 7 , 4 , 12 , counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4280          			display_string( "Rs." , 15 , 7 , 4 , 35 , counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4281          			display_string( float_to_string( temp_expenses.price ) , 0 , 7 , 4 , 39 , counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4282  
   4283  		        	display_string( get_date_string( temp_expenses.day , temp_expenses.month , temp_expenses.year ) , 0 , 7 , 4 , 50 , counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4284  
   4285  		                balance_amount = balance_amount - temp_expenses.price;
   4286          			display_string( "Rs." , 15 , 7 , 4 , 63 , counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4287          			display_string( float_to_string( balance_amount ) , 0 , 7 , 4 , 67 , counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4288  
   4289  			        counter++;
   4290  				file.read( (char *) & temp_expenses , sizeof( temp_expenses ) );
   4291  			}
   4292                          record_no = 0;
   4293                          refresh = FALSE;
   4294                  }
   4295  
   4296                  my_key.read_key_stroke();
   4297  
   4298  		if( my_key.get_ascii_code() == 0 )
   4299  		{
   4300  			switch( my_key.get_scan_code() )
   4301  			{
   4302  				case 15: //shift tab
   4303                                  	if( tab_counter == 0 )
   4304                                          {
   4305                                          	tab_counter = 3;
   4306                                          }
   4307                                          else
   4308                                          {
   4309                                          	tab_counter--;
   4310                                          }
   4311                                          break;
   4312                                  case 80: //down
   4313  					if( skip < count - 15 )
   4314  					{
   4315  						refresh = TRUE;
   4316  						skip++;
   4317  					}
   4318  					break;
   4319                                  case 72: //up
   4320  					if( skip > 0 )
   4321  					{
   4322  						refresh = TRUE;
   4323  						skip--;
   4324  					}
   4325                                          break;
   4326  				case 71: //home key
   4327                                          if( skip != 0 )
   4328                                          {
   4329  	                                        skip = 0;
   4330                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   4331                                          }
   4332  					break;
   4333  
   4334  				case 79: //end key
   4335                                  	if( skip < count - 15 )
   4336                                          {
   4337  		                                skip = count - 15;
   4338                                          	refresh = TRUE;
   4339                                          }
   4340  					break;
   4341  				case 81://page down
   4342                                  	if( skip >= count - 15 )
   4343                                          {
   4344                                          	break;
   4345                                          }
   4346  
   4347                                          refresh = TRUE;
   4348                                  	skip = skip + 15;
   4349  
   4350                                          if( skip > ( count - 15 ) )
   4351                                          {
   4352                                          	skip = ( count - 15 );
   4353                                          }
   4354  
   4355  					break;
   4356  				case 73://page up
   4357                                  	if( skip > 15 )
   4358                                          {
   4359                                          	skip -= 15;
   4360                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   4361                                          }
   4362                                          else
   4363                                          {
   4364                                                  if( skip != 0 )
   4365                                                  {
   4366  	                                        	skip = 0;
   4367                                                          refresh = TRUE;
   4368                                                  }
   4369                                          }
   4370  					break;
   4371  			}
   4372  		}
   4373  		else
   4374  		{
   4375  			switch( my_key.get_ascii_code() )
   4376  			{
   4377  				case 9://tab
   4378                                  	if( tab_counter == 3 )
   4379                                          {
   4380                                          	tab_counter = 0;
   4381                                          }
   4382                                          else
   4383                                          {
   4384                                          	tab_counter++;
   4385                                          }
   4386                                          break;
   4387  
   4388  				case 13://enter
   4389                                  	switch( tab_counter )
   4390                                          {
   4391                                          	case 0:
   4392                                                  	if( skip > 0 )
   4393                                                          {
   4394                                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   4395                                                          	skip--;
   4396                                                          }
   4397                                                  	break;
   4398                                                  case 1:
   4399                                                  	if( skip < count - 15 )
   4400                                                          {
   4401                                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   4402  								skip++;
   4403                                                          }
   4404                                                  	break;
   4405                                                  case 2:
   4406                                                  	int result = ask_filename_dialog_box( temp_string );
   4407                                                          if( result == 1 )
   4408                                                          {
   4409                                                          	write_expenses_report_to_file( temp_string );
   4410                                                          }
   4411                                                  	break;
   4412                                                  case 3:
   4413  		                                        repeat_loop = 0;
   4414  		                                        break;
   4415  					}
   4416                                          break;
   4417                                  case 27://ESC
   4418                                  	repeat_loop = 0;
   4419                                          break;
   4420  
   4421  			}
   4422  		}
   4423                  file.clear();
   4424                  file.seekg( 0 , ios::beg );
   4425  	}
   4426  
   4427          file.close();
   4428          change_active_video_page( 0 );
   4429  }

   4488                          	break;

   4490

   4492

   4494                  {

   4496  
   4497  			file.read( (char *) & temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   4498  
   4499  	                while( file && temp-- )
   4500          	        {
   4501                                  record_no++;
   4502  				file.read( (char *) & temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   4503  	                }
   4504  
   4505  		        while( file && counter < 15 )
   4506          		{
   4507                                  record_no++;

   4521

   4523  				file.read( (char *) & temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   4524  			}
   4525                          record_no = 0;
   4526                          refresh = FALSE;
   4527                  }
   4528  
   4529                  my_key.read_key_stroke();
   4530  
   4531  		if( my_key.get_ascii_code() == 0 )
   4532  		{
   4533  			switch( my_key.get_scan_code() )
   4534  			{
   4535  				case 15: //shift tab
   4536                                  	if( tab_counter == 0 )
   4537                                          {
   4538                                          	tab_counter = 3;
   4539                                          }
   4540                                          else
   4541                                          {
   4542                                          	tab_counter--;
   4543                                          }
   4544                                          break;
   4545                                  case 80: //down
   4546  					if( skip < count - 15 )
   4547  					{
   4548  						refresh = TRUE;
   4549  						skip++;
   4550  					}
   4551  					break;
   4552                                  case 72: //up
   4553  					if( skip > 0 )
   4554  					{
   4555  						refresh = TRUE;
   4556  						skip--;
   4557  					}
   4558                                          break;

   4560                                          if( skip != 0 )
   4561                                          {
   4562  	                                        skip = 0;
   4563                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   4564                                          }
   4565  					break;
   4566  
   4567  				case 79: //end key

   4571                                          	refresh = TRUE;
   4572                                          }
   4573  					break;

   4576                                          {
   4577                                          	break;
   4578                                          }
   4579  
   4580                                          refresh = TRUE;
   4581                                  	skip = skip + 15;
   4582  
   4583                                          if( skip > ( count - 15 ) )
   4584                                          {
   4585                                          	skip = ( count - 15 );
   4586                                          }
   4587  
   4588  					break;
   4589  				case 73://page up
   4590                                  	if( skip > 15 )
   4591                                          {
   4592                                          	skip -= 15;
   4593                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   4594                                          }
   4595                                          else
   4596                                          {
   4597                                                  if( skip != 0 )
   4598                                                  {
   4599  	                                        	skip = 0;
   4600                                                          refresh = TRUE;
   4601                                                  }
   4602                                          }
   4603  					break;
   4604  			}
   4605  		}
   4606  		else
   4607  		{
   4608  			switch( my_key.get_ascii_code() )
   4609  			{
   4610  				case 9://tab
   4611                                  	if( tab_counter == 3 )
   4612                                          {
   4613                                          	tab_counter = 0;
   4614                                          }
   4615                                          else
   4616                                          {
   4617                                          	tab_counter++;
   4618                                          }
   4619                                          break;
   4620

   4628                                                          	skip--;
   4629                                                          }
   4630                                                  	break;

   4632                                                  	if( skip < count - 15 )
   4633                                                          {
   4634                                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   4635  								skip++;
   4636                                                          }
   4637                                                  	break;
   4638                                                  case 2:
   4639                                                  	int result = ask_filename_dialog_box( temp_string );

   4983          			display_string( "QUALIFICATION:" , 15 , 7 , 4 , 7 , jump * counter + 10 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4984  	        		display_string( "JOINING DATE :" , 15 , 7 , 4 , 7 , jump * counter + 11 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4985  	        		display_string( "ROOM NO.:" , 15 , 7 , 4 , 40 , jump * counter + 11 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4986  
   4987                                  record_no++;
   4988                                  itoa( record_no , temp_string , 10 );
   4989  			        display_string(  temp_string , 15 , 7 , 4 , 18 , jump * counter + 4 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4990  			        display_string( temp_member.name , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 6 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4991  
   4992          			if( temp_member.sex == 0 )
   4993  			        {
   4994  				        display_string( "MALE" , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 7 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4995  		        	}
   4996  			        else
   4997          			{
   4998  				        display_string( "FEMALE" , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 7 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   4999  		        	}
   5000  
   5001  			        display_string( temp_member.address , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 8 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   5002          			display_string( temp_member.phone , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 9 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   5003  		        	display_string( temp_member.qualification , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 10 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   5004  			        display_string( temp_member.qualification , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 10 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   5005  
   5006  		        	display_string( get_date_string( temp_member.day , temp_member.month , temp_member.year ) , 0 , 7 , 4 , 24 , jump * counter + 11 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   5007  		        	display_string( temp_member.room_no , 0 , 7 , 4 , 50 , jump * counter + 11 , NO_SHADOW , 1 );
   5008  
   5009  			        counter++;
   5010  				file.read( (char *) & temp_member , sizeof( temp_member ) );
   5011  			}
   5012                          refresh = FALSE;
   5013                          record_no = 0;
   5014                  }
   5015  
   5016                  my_key.read_key_stroke();
   5017  
   5018  		if( my_key.get_ascii_code() == 0 )
   5019  		{
   5020  			switch( my_key.get_scan_code() )
   5021  			{
   5022  				case 15: //shift tab
   5023                                  	if( tab_counter == 0 )
   5024                                          {
   5025                                          	tab_counter = 3;
   5026                                          }
   5027                                          else
   5028                                          {
   5029                                          	tab_counter--;
   5030                                          }
   5031                                          break;
   5032                                  case 80: //down arrow
   5033  					if( skip < count - 2 )
   5034  					{
   5035  						refresh = TRUE;
   5036  						skip++;
   5037  					}
   5038  					break;
   5039                                  case 72: //up arrow
   5040  					if( skip > 0 )
   5041  					{
   5042  						refresh = TRUE;
   5043  						skip--;
   5044  					}
   5045  					break;
   5046  				case 71: //home key
   5047                                          if( skip != 0 )
   5048                                          {
   5049  	                                        skip = 0;
   5050                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   5051                                          }
   5052  					break;
   5053  
   5054  				case 79: //end key
   5055                                  	if( skip < count - 2 )
   5056                                          {
   5057  		                                skip = count - 2;
   5058                                          	refresh = TRUE;
   5059                                          }
   5060  					break;
   5061  				case 81://page down
   5062                                  	if( skip < count - 4 )
   5063                                          {
   5064                                          	skip = skip + 2 ;
   5065                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   5066                                          }
   5067                                          else
   5068                                          {
   5069                                                  if( skip != count - 2 )
   5070                                                  {
   5071  	                                        	skip = count - 2;
   5072                                                          refresh = TRUE;
   5073                                                  }
   5074                                          }
   5075  					break;
   5076  				case 73://page up
   5077                                  	if( skip > 2 )
   5078                                          {
   5079                                          	skip -= 2;
   5080                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   5081                                          }
   5082                                          else
   5083                                          {
   5084                                                  if( skip != 0 )
   5085                                                  {
   5086  	                                        	skip = 0;
   5087                                                          refresh = TRUE;
   5088                                                  }
   5089                                          }
   5090  					break;
   5091  			}
   5092  		}
   5093  		else
   5094  		{
   5095  			switch( my_key.get_ascii_code() )
   5096  			{
   5097  				case 9://tab
   5098                                  	if( tab_counter == 3 )
   5099                                          {
   5100                                          	tab_counter = 0;
   5101                                          }
   5102                                          else
   5103                                          {
   5104                                          	tab_counter++;
   5105                                          }
   5106                                          break;
   5107  
   5108  				case 13://enter
   5109                                  	switch( tab_counter )
   5110                                          {
   5111                                          	case 0:
   5112                                                  	if( skip > 0 )
   5113                                                          {
   5114                                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   5115                                                          	skip--;
   5116                                                          }
   5117                                                  	break;
   5118                                                  case 1:
   5119                                                  	if( skip < count - 2 )
   5120                                                          {
   5121                                                                  refresh = TRUE;
   5122  								skip++;
   5123                                                          }
   5124                                                  	break;
   5125                                                  case 2:
   5126                                                  	int result = ask_filename_dialog_box( temp_string );
   5127                                                          if( result == 1 )
   5128                                                          {
   5129                                                          	write_members_report_to_file( temp_string );
   5130                                                          }
   5131                                                  	break;
   5132                                                  case 3:
   5133  		                                        repeat_loop = 0;
   5134  		                                        break;
   5135  					}
   5136                                          break;
   5137                                  case 27://ESC
   5138                                  	repeat_loop = 0;
   5139                                          break;
   5140  
   5141  			}
   5142  		}
   5143                  file.clear();
   5144                  file.seekg( 0 , ios::beg );
   5145  	}
   5146  
   5147          file.close();
   5148          change_active_video_page( 0 );
   5149  }

   5151  //FUNCTIONS FOR COUNTING RECORDS
   5152  
   5153  int count_member_records( void )
   5154  {
   5155          int count = 0;
   5156  	ifstream file;
   5157          file.open( "MEMBERS.DAT" , ios::in | ios::binary );
   5158          file.read( (char *) &temp_member , sizeof( temp_member ) );
   5159  
   5160          while( file )
   5161          {
   5162                  count++;
   5163  	        file.read( (char *) &temp_member , sizeof( temp_member ) );
   5164          }
   5165  
   5166          file.close();
   5167          return ( count );
   5168  }

   5322  //FUNCTIONS FOR WRITING RECORDS
   5323  
   5324  void write_member_record_to_file( void )
   5325  {
   5326          ifstream file;
   5327          ofstream temp;
   5328  
   5329          date first;
   5330          date second;
   5331  
   5332          member temp2_member;
   5333  
   5334          first.da_day = temp_member.day;
   5335          first.da_mon = temp_member.month;
   5336          first.da_year = temp_member.year;
   5337  
   5338          file.open( "MEMBERS.DAT" , ios::in | ios::binary );
   5339          temp.open( "TEMP.DAT" , ios::trunc | ios::binary );
   5340  
   5341  	file.read( (char *) &temp2_member , sizeof( temp2_member ) );
   5342  
   5343          second.da_day = temp2_member.day;
   5344  	second.da_mon = temp2_member.month;
   5345          second.da_year = temp2_member.year;
   5346  
   5347          while( is_chronological( first , second ) && file )
   5348          {
   5349  		temp.write( (char *) &temp2_member, sizeof( temp2_member ) );
   5350                  file.read( (char *) &temp2_member , sizeof( temp2_member ) );
   5351  
   5352  	        second.da_day = temp2_member.day;
   5353  		second.da_mon = temp2_member.month;
   5354  	        second.da_year = temp2_member.year;
   5355          }
   5356  
   5357          temp.write( ( char * ) &temp_member , sizeof( temp_member ) );
   5358  
   5359          while( file )
   5360          {
   5361          	temp.write( ( char * ) &temp2_member , sizeof( temp2_member ) );
   5362                  file.read( (char *) &temp2_member , sizeof( temp2_member ) );
   5363          }
   5364  
   5365          file.close();
   5366          temp.close();
   5367  
   5368          unlink( "MEMBERS.DAT" );
   5369          rename( "TEMP.DAT" , "MEMBERS.DAT" );
   5370  }

   5613          temp.open( "TEMP.DAT" , ios::in | ios::binary );
   5614  
   5615          file.read( (char *) &temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   5616  
   5617          while( file )
   5618          {
   5619                  rec++;
   5620                  if( rec != record_no )
   5621                  {
   5622                  	temp.write( (char *) &temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   5623                  }
   5624  	        file.read( (char *) &temp_room , sizeof( temp_room ) );
   5625          }
   5626  
   5627          file.close();
   5628          temp.close();
   5629  
   5630          unlink( "ROOMS.DAT" );
   5631          rename( "TEMP.DAT" , "ROOMS.DAT" );
   5632  }
   5633  
   5634  //FUNCTIONS FOR WRITING AND READING BACK SETTINGS
   5635  
   5636  void write_settings_to_file( char * file_name )
   5637  {
   5638  	ofstream file;
   5639  
   5640          file.open( "SETTINGS.DAT", ios::trunc | ios::binary );
   5641          file.write( file_name , 50 );
   5642  
   5643          file.close();
   5644  }
   5645  
   5646  void load_settings( void )
   5647  {
   5648  	ifstream file;
   5649  
   5650          file.open( "SETTINGS.DAT" , ios::in | ios::binary );
   5651          file.read( expenses_file , 50 );
   5652  
   5653          file.close();
   5654  }
   5655  
   5656  //FUNCTIONS FOR FINDING TOTAL AND BALANCE AMOUNTS
   5657  
   5658  float find_total_amount( void )
   5659  {
   5660  	float total = 0;
   5661  	ifstream file;
   5662  
   5663          file.open( "BILLS.DAT" , ios::in | ios::binary );
   5664          file.read( (char *) &temp_bill , sizeof( temp_bill ) );
   5665  
   5666          while( file )
   5667          {
   5668                  total = total + temp_bill.amount;
   5669  	        file.read( (char *) &temp_bill , sizeof( temp_bill ) );
   5670          }
   5671  
   5672          file.close();
   5673          return ( total );
   5674  }
   5675  
   5676  float find_balance_amount( void )
   5677  {
   5678          float balance;
   5679  	ifstream file;
   5680  
   5681          balance = find_total_amount();
   5682  
   5683          file.open( expenses_file , ios::in | ios::binary );
   5684          file.read( (char *) &temp_expenses , sizeof( temp_expenses ) );
   5685  
   5686          while( file )
   5687          {
   5688                  balance = balance - temp_expenses.price;
   5689  	        file.read( (char *) &temp_expenses , sizeof( temp_expenses ) );
   5690          }
   5691  
   5692          file.close();
   5693          return ( balance );
   5694  }
